title: Mind of the Virtuoso Music

embed.description: I will make you beautiful. I will make you perfect.

body:
Is there any way a red could give us a download of that song? I keep listening to the trailer but I would love something I could download!
Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Hey Chloe,

Thanks for your interest! We usually upload music to SoundCloud when the champ gets released. That said, I'm going to see if we can release this piece sooner.

Thanks for playing!

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kIAzE9QO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-07T23:15:55.408+0000)
>
> Hey Chloe,
> 
> Thanks for your interest! We usually upload music to SoundCloud when the champ gets released. That said, I'm going to see if we can release this piece sooner.
> 
> Thanks for playing!

Oh sweet! Thanks for the quick response! Looking forward to it :) thanks guys for producing this piece as well!

Any news on the upload?

I absolutely need that soundtrack....

Hey guys,

We just uploaded the music from the "Mind of the Virtuoso" cinematic on SoundCloud!

You can listen to it at [https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/jhin-mind-of-the-virtuoso](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/jhin-mind-of-the-virtuoso).

Thanks fir listening!

Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kIAzE9QO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-11T18:04:03.146+0000)
>
> Hey guys,
> 
> We just uploaded the music from the "Mind of the Virtuoso" cinematic on SoundCloud!
> 
> You can listen to it at [https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/jhin-mind-of-the-virtuoso](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/jhin-mind-of-the-virtuoso).
> 
> Thanks fir listening!
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

You guys ROCK!
great song and thanks man :)
Never saw the winter theme song on there.  Are you guys not uploading that one?  It was really good.
